models

Class SolvingSequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.SolvingSequence

  • public class SolvingSequence
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a sequence of movements to apply to the 15-puzzle board. The movement are represented by the direction the empty space is going to move.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SolvingSequence.Direction
      Represents the possible directions the empty space can move.
